original_title: The Toughest Man in the World
overview: Mr. T's first starring made-for-TV movie role has him playing a tough and scowling, but softhearted, nightclub bouncer who finds himself involved with a bunch of kids after being conned into taking over a youth center.
tagline: It's Harder to Win When you Play by the Rules!
title: The Toughest Man in the World
